name: Dead eat dead
description:
This is a retro style 2D pixel art survival adventure shooter. You control a character armed with a shotgun and grenades. You need to search level for supplies and keys to open locked doors. You can push and move boxes and fuel barrels located on game levels.
Plot. Mutated virus of rabies turned population of your town into dangerous zombies. Your motorbike is out of fuel and you desperately need to leave the zone of contamination. Get your shotgun, collect supplies and spend munition carefully. You can push forward boxes and barrels or move blocked cars and use them against the infected or groups of marauders. Watch out for shaking garbage cans. They can hide a supply or an ambush. It is better to be stealth and avoid enemies.
